Text: Hey, if you're archiving these (spanned RAR file), are they being error proofed as well? There would be no other reason to span archive files.

Thx, but please, unrar it first next time. There is no reason for distributing video material in archived form, it only decreases the number of seeders as many people don't want to leave the RAR's around. It only wastes 1.7 GB's of hard disk space and don't contribute any value compared with sharing the actual MKV file as torrent clients have built-in error checking and recovery system for bad data.
There are some visible video compression errors in this rip, so I hope there will be a PROPER released.
